Title: Payments and cheque workflow

Description:

Record payments, support multiple payment modes (cash/cheque) and manage cheque lifecycle (received, deposited, cleared, bounced, reissue).

Acceptance criteria:
- Payment model and linkage to invoices.
- Support cash and cheque modes; store cheque metadata when mode = cheque.
- Endpoints to mark cheque deposited/cleared/bounced and to reissue cheques.

Notes:
- Useful only if you accept offline payments.
